description:
A large collection of games, problems, puzzles and activities to use as part of maths clubs.

Each resource comes with a set of facilitator notes and are designed to be run by students or teachers alike.
title: Maths Club Pack

description:
Anyone excited about playing maths games and learning from them could become a Maths Game Envoy. This could include a student, teacher, parent, out of
school youth, librarian etc. who, once trained, becomes an agent of change in their
community who challenges established views that "maths is boring, hard and only for
some" by showing that maths can be fun and accessible for everyone.
title: Maths Games Youth Envoys Handbook

description: A deck of 54 cards with every single card featuring a unique activity, engaging participants in games, puzzles or fun mathematical facts.
title: Virtual Maths Camp Cards

description: Videos with planned "stop-and-go‚Äù moments for learners to think, discuss, and experiment
title: Pause and Go Videos

description:
Problems and puzzles to support mathematical thinking, problem-solving, and a love of mathematics!

All with notes for facilitators and available in English and French
title: Maths Club App
